original_title: Jorge Prelorán, el cine de un humanista
overview: Jorge Prelorán was one of the most prolific documentary filmmakers from Argentina. This documentary presents an interview which focuses on his creative work, and on how his ideas about documentaries are key in the uniqueness of his topics and characters.

production_companies.name: Escuela Nacional de Experimentación y Realización Cinematográfica

title: Jorge Prelorán, el cine de un humanista
